talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Hello!<sp:5:0:0> I have fantastic news!


<snd:Happy_00>I was chosen to be part of the team
that is going to take down the monster
fort!<sp:5:0:0> I am ready and raring to go!
<sp:3:0:2:0501>...<sp:5:0:0>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>P-pardon me?


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You mean to say that...<sp:5:0:0>you already...<sp:5:0:0>
defeated the monsters?<sp:5:1:0> And all by
yourself to boot?
You...<sp:5:0:0> YOU...<sp:5:0:0> You really ought to boast
about things like that!

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Runaway_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You are amazing! One of a kind!


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01><sp:0:2:2:6400>I mean, really though. Wow!
talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Hello, L—<sp:5:0:0> I mean, hello, Hylian!


<sp:0:2:2:5000>I feel...<sp:5:0:0>it would be a bit embarrassing to start calling
you Link just all of a sudden...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:6400>Well, in any case!<sp:5:0:0> I heard that you and
Sidon bested the <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>sludge monster!

Wow! That is extraordinary!


I must get in on the action myself!
Yes, I must!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>I hear that Gaddison found a monster fort,
so...<sp:5:0:0>there has been some talk of trying to
clear them out!
talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Hey! Hylian! How are you faring?


Everything is optimal here! <sp:5:0:0>The sludge has
thankfully stopped falling from the sky.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>That said, <sp:5:0:0>it is hard to believe that the
phenomena happening elsewhere in
Hyrule are still ongoing.
As I stand here gazing at our peaceful
mountains, I find that hard to wrap my
mind around.
talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>While the sludge has stopped falling here,
the phenomena happening elsewhere in
Hyrule are still ongoing...
As I stand here gazing at our peaceful
mountains, I find that hard to wrap my
mind around.
talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Hello, L—<sp:5:0:0> I mean, hello, Hylian!


<sp:0:2:2:5000>I feel...<sp:5:0:0>it would be a bit embarrassing to start calling
you Link just all of a sudden...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:6400>Well, in any case!<sp:5:0:0> I heard that you and
Sidon bested the <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>sludge monster!

Wow! That is extraordinary!


<snd:Greeting>I must increase my training so that I may
become a mighty warrior who is chosen
to defeat those foul monsters!
talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Train first, train second, and then train
even more! That is the recipe for success!

I lost my opportunity to be assigned to
Lookout Landing...

<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>So now I must train with this spear until
I am the very best! More training! More,
more, more!
talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Tired>Ah! I lost my chance...*pant* to be
summoned to Lookout Landing!

More... I must train with my spear
even more!
talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>We were able to wash away much of the
sludge thanks in large part to the efforts
of Lady Yona and the others.
Still, I advise you to tread carefully. That
dreaded substance is treacherous at best.
talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>I daresay it would be best to speak with
King Dorephan.

However, he left to investigate the sludge,
and I am unsure when he will return.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Why not see what Lady Yona has to say?
She can be found at the <clr:0000>infirmary <clr:ffff>in
the back.
talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey! Hylian! <sp:5:0:0>Whatever is the matter?<sp:5:0:0>
You look like something is on your mind.
talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! Hylian! I hear you came to the
domain for some kind of investigation.
talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, what joy!<sp:5:0:0> Tottika and Tie...<sp:5:1:0>
And Capelo as well!

<snd:Happy_00>Once they have fully recovered, I must
throw them a massive welcome-home
celebration!
talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perhaps you should hear what Lady Yona
has to say instead. She can be found at
the <clr:0000>infirmary <clr:ffff>in the back.
She is treating those who were harmed by
the sludge.
talk1055:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad>I am just a tad concerned, but at times
like these, I must do my very best!

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Leave the domain to me, and I will leave
Prince Sidon to you!
talk1056:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>You should speak to King Dorephan. Ah,
except he is out investigating the sludge.
I do not know when he will return.
talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! Hylian! It's good to see you out and
about at such an early hour!<sp:5:0:0> I hear you
came here for some kind of investigation.
talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400><snd:Sad_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Prince Sidon is gone. King Dorephan is gone.
Lady Yona is gone as well... At times like these,
I must do my very best!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Leave the matters of the domain to me!<sp:5:0:0>
In turn, I will leave Prince Sidon to you!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I... I am just a tad concerned, so please
do what must be done with haste!
talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! Hylian! It's good to see you still alert
at this late hour!<sp:5:0:0> I hear you came to the
domain for some kind of investigation.
talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Attention, Hylian!<sp:5:0:0> Beware the dreaded
sludge, or you will be in grave danger!

Thanks to Lady Yona and the others, we
washed much of it away, but we cannot
be certain it will not rain down again!
talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! Hylian! How is the investigation
going?
talk1060:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>The <clr:0000>throne room <clr:ffff>has become a play area
for the children.

It was Prince Sidon's brilliant idea to give
them somewhere safe to play.<sp:5:1:0> Even in
these trying times, he is so thoughtful.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Their parents were quite relieved. This will
help keep them safe and healthy, <sp:5:0:0>which
will also make Lady Yona's work easier!
The young ones are overjoyed and already
playing. <sp:5:0:0>They have lots of energy to burn
since they have not been able to go out.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00><clr:ffff>Ledo, who was just cleaning the throne
room, had to hide in a corner to get out
of their way!
talk1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>There were a few who opposed at first, 
but Prince Sidon knew how beneficial it
would be. I have much to learn from him.
talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Lady Yona just announced that things
have made a turn for the better regarding
her treatment of the patients.
That means my soldier friends should be
recuperating soon. I am overjoyed!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>The domain is going to be just fine!
Yes, it certainly is!
talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Jiahto<clr:ffff>, the Zora historian, is investigating
the ruins at <clr:0000>Toto Lake<clr:ffff>.

Toto Lake can be found on the high
ground north of the domain. But beware...

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>The sludge waterfall is pouring down
terribly at present, and that aside, it's a
dangerous place filled with monsters!
If you insist on going, please be careful!
talk1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>You really are amazing...


I must drum up some motivation so I can
become my strongest self as well!
talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>He went off to investigate the sludge.<sp:5:1:0>
I assume he will be returning to the
<clr:0000>throne room<clr:ffff> shortly!
talk1065:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>Let me think. Recently it feels as
though everything is new...

Ah, it is perhaps worth noting that
Captain Bazz has not returned.
talk1066:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>There is not a monster alive that can get
the best of our Captain Bazz!

I am not worried at all! No, not one bit!
talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Gaddison was wondering what we should
do with the monster fort that has recently
surfaced. 
<sp:3:0:2:0900>In my opinion, we should destroy it!
Do you not agree?

<sp:3:0:2:0500>However...<sp:5:1:0> I am not certain that I will be
selected for the cleanup crew.

If only veterans attend to the battle<sp:5:0:0>
and I protect the east bridge in place
of Gaddison...
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Well, if you ask me, that is not such a
bad idea!
talk1067:
<snd:TalkPositive>Ever since he went to patrol the area near
that Skyview Tower that the Hylians built,
he has not returned.
He insisted on going out there all by
himself, as he said it was overrun by
monsters. However...
talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>I must head to my post with haste!<sp:5:0:0>
Farewell!
talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The place that Gaddison is guarding to
the east is of critical importance.

There are quite a lot of monsters above
Mikau Lake and by East Reservoir Lake.

<snd:Think_01>That means there are many opportunities
to wave one's spear about, which seems
like a good fit for me.
